translation.english: Developed by the people, for the people.
translation.spanish: Desarrollado por la gente, para la gente.
translation.portuguese: Desenvolvido pelo povo, para o povo.
translation.swedish: Developed by the people, for the people.

translation.english: Hush is a private implementation of the "Zerocash" protocol forked from [Zcash].
translation.spanish: Hush es una implementación privada del protocolo "Zerocash" basada en el código de [Zcash].
translation.polish: Hush jest nowym wcieleniem protokołu "Zerocash" forkiem [Zcash].
translation.portuguese: Hush é uma implementação privada do protocolo "Zerocash" derivado do [Zcash].
translation.swedish: Hush is a private implementation of the "Zerocash" protocol forked from [Zcash].

translation.english: Based on Bitcoin's code, it intends to offer a far higher standard of privacy through a sophisticated zero-knowledge proving scheme that preserves confidentiality of transaction metadata.
translation.spanish: Basado en el código de Bitcoin, pretende ofrecer un estándar de privacidad mucho más alto, a través de un sofisticado sistema de comprobación de cero-conocimiento, que preserva la confidencialidad de los meta-datos de transacciones.
translation.polish: Bazując na kodzie Bitcoin'a, oferuje on znacznie większy standard prywatności, poprzez wyrafinowany system potwierdzeń zero-knowledge, który zachowuje poufność metadanych transakcji.
translation.portuguese: Com base no código do Bitcoin, pretende oferecer um padrão de privacidade muito maior através de um esquema sofisticado de provas de conhecimento-nulo que preserve a confidencialidade dos metadados da transação.
translation.swedish: Based on Bitcoin's code, it intends to offer a far higher standard of privacy through a sophisticated zero-knowledge proving scheme that preserves confidentiality of transaction metadata.

translation.english: Hush trusted setup follows the same setup provided by the Zcash team. We do not have any keys to create coins from thin air.
translation.spanish: El establecimiento confiable de Hush sigue la misma línea provista por el equipo de Zcash. No tenemos llaves para crear monedas de la nada.
translation.polish: Hush trusted setup obiera tą samą ścieżkę, co zespół Zcash'a, gwarantując tym, że nie ma możliwości sztucznego stworzenia nowych monet, poza oficjalną emisją odbywającą się za pomocą miningu.
translation.portuguese: A configuração confiável de Hush segue a mesma configuração fornecida pelo time Zcash. Nós não temos nenhuma chave para criar moedas do nada.
translation.swedish: Hush trusted setup follows the same setup provided by the Zcash team. We do not have any keys to create coins from thin air.

translation.english: Zcash held a ceremony where the individuals holding shards of the private key destroyed it.
translation.spanish: Zcash celebró una ceremonia donde los individuos que poseían los fragmentos de la llave privada la destruyeron.
translation.polish: Zespół Zcash komisyjnie zniszczył cząstki posiadanych przez siebie private keys.
translation.portuguese: Zcash realizou uma cerimônia onde os indivíduos que possuíam fragmentos da chave privada a destruíram.
translation.swedish: Zcash held a ceremony where the individuals holding shards of the private key destroyed it.

translation.english: We believe there aren't enough currencies out there where the development team listens to the community, where the development team are open for suggestions and discussions.
translation.spanish: Creemos que no hay suficientes monedas en las que el equipo de desarrollo escuche a la comunidad, donde el equipo de desarrollo esté abierto a sugerencias y discusiones.
translation.polish: Wierzymy, że na rynku wciąż brakuje odpowiedniej waluty, której deweloperzy słuchają swojej społeczności oraz są otwarci na wszelkiego rodzaju sugestie, oraz pomysły.
translation.portuguese: Acreditamos que não há moedas suficientes lá fora, onde a equipe de desenvolvimento escuta a comunidade e está aberta para sugestões e discussões.
translation.swedish: We believe there aren't enough currencies out there where the development team listens to the community, where the development team are open for suggestions and discussions.

translation.english: Es por ello que creemos que Hush será una moneda exitosa a largo plazo: gracias a la comunicación entre la comunidad y los desarrolladores.
translation.spanish: That's why we believe Hush will be a successful currency over a long-term view because of the communication between the community and the developers.
translation.polish: Dlatego też uważamy, że HUSH w przyszłości odniesie ogromny sukces, zawdzięczając to porozumieniu pomiędzy społecznością a deweloperami.
translation.portuguese: É por isso que acreditamos que Hush será uma moeda de sucesso em uma visão de longo prazo, em razão da comunicação entre a comunidade e os desenvolvedores.
translation.swedish: That's why we believe Hush will be a successful currency over a long-term view because of the communication between the community and the developers.

translation.english: We will always consider your thoughts and ideas if they are beneficial for Hush as currency and as a community.
translation.spanish: Siempre consideraremos tus pensamientos e ideas, siempre y cuando sean benéficos para Hush como moneda y como comunidad.
translation.polish: Rozważymy Twoje wszelkie pomysły i idee, jeśli będą one korzystne dla HUSH'a jako waluty oraz jej społeczności.
translation.portuguese: Nós sempre consideraremos seus pensamentos e ideias se forem benéficos para Hush como moeda e como comunidade.
translation.swedish: We will always consider your thoughts and ideas if they are beneficial for Hush as currency and as a community.

translation.english: Cryptocurrencies are decentralized from governments but if the community can't be a part of any decisions, is it really decentralized?
translation.spanish: Las cripto-monedas son descentralizadas en relación a los gobiernos, pero si la comunidad no es parte de ninguna decisión, ¿es una descentralización real?
translation.polish: Kryptowaluty są zdecentralizowane, nie podlegając wpływom żadnych rządów, ale jeśli społeczność kryptowalut nie ma prawa głosu oraz wpływu na ważne decyzje, to czy są one naprawdę zdecentralizowane?
translation.portuguese: As criptomoedas são descentralizadas dos governos, mas se a comunidade não pode fazer parte das tomadas de decisões, é realmente descentralizada?
translation.swedish: Cryptocurrencies are decentralized from governments but if the community can't be a part of any decisions, is it really decentralized?

translation.english: With Hush your voice always matters, your contributions are always appreciated and we are always grateful for any kind of support.
translation.spanish: Con Hush, tu voz es importante siempre, tus contribuciones son siempre apreciadas, y estamos siempre agradecidos por cualquier tipo de apoyo.
translation.polish: Dlatego Twój głos zawsze będzie się dla nas liczył, doceniamy też wszelkie formy wsparcia ze strony naszej społeczności.
translation.portuguese: Com Hush sua voz é ouvida, suas contribuições são sempre apreciadas e estamos sempre gratos por qualquer tipo de ajuda.
translation.swedish: With Hush your voice always matters, your contributions are always appreciated and we are always grateful for any kind of support.

translation.portuguese: A cada 4 anos (o mesmo do Bitcoin)

translation.english: You may contribute and be a part of the decisions.
translation.spanish: Puedes contribuir y ser parte de las decisiones.
translation.polish: Możesz przyczyniać się do rozwuju oraz podejmować wspólnie z nami ważne decyzje.
translation.portuguese: Você pode contribuir e fazer parte das decisões.
translation.swedish: You may contribute and be a part of the decisions.

translation.english: There will be a slow and steady progress when it comes to value and development stability.
translation.spanish: Habrá un progreso lento pero seguro, en relación a estabilidad del valor y el desarrollo.
translation.polish: Oferujemy długotrwały i stabilny rozwój wartości HUSH'a.
translation.portuguese: Haverá um progresso lento e constante quando se trata de valor e estabilidade de desenvolvimento.
translation.swedish: There will be a slow and steady progress when it comes to value and development stability.

translation.english: Because of a small premine and a dedicated dev team, finances will not be a problem.
translation.spanish: Gracias a una pequeña pre-minería, y a un equipo de desarrollo dedicado, las finanzas no serán un problema.
translation.polish: Dzięki małej ilości wstępnie wykopanych moenet (premine) oraz oddanemu zespołowi deweloperów, kwestie finansowe nie będą stanowić problemu w przyszłości.
translation.portuguese: Por causa de uma pequena "pré-mineração" e uma equipe de desenvolvimento dedicada, as finanças não serão um problema.
translation.swedish: Because of a small premine and a dedicated dev team, finances will not be a problem.

translation.english: You can review, comment and propose updates.
translation.spanish: Puedes revisar, comentar, y proponer actualizaciones.
translation.polish: Możesz oceniać, komentować i proponowac nowe aktualizacje kodu.
translation.portuguese: Você pode revisar, comentar e propor atualizações.
translation.swedish: You can review, comment and propose updates.

translation.spanish: Tus pagos y transacciones son privadas.
translation.polish: Twoje płatności & transakcje pozostają w pełni prywatne.
translation.portuguese: Seus pagamentos e transações são privados.

translation.english: Uses a Peer to Peer network.
translation.portuguese: Usa uma rede Peer to Peer.
translation.swedish: Uses a Peer to Peer network.

translation.english: Send money to anyone in the world.
translation.spanish: Envía dinero a cualquier persona en el mundo.
translation.polish: Wysyłaj pieniądze ludziom na całym świecie.
translation.portuguese: Mande dinheiro para qualquer pessoa no mundo.
translation.swedish: Send money to anyone in the world.

translation.english: Axel is a 22 year old District Heating Planner from Stockholm, Sweden. He's been doing business, big and small, since he was about 10 years old. Axel joined the crypto-scene the first time back in 2010-2011.
translation.spanish: Axel tiene 22 años y es Planificador Distrital de Calefacción, de Estocolmo, Suecia. Ha creado negocios pequeños y grandes desde los 10 años de edad. Axel se unió a la escena de la criptografía por primera vez en 2010-2011.
translation.polish: Axel jest 22-letnim inżynierem ogrzewnictwa, pochodzącym ze Sztokholmu w Szwecji. Już od najmłodszych lat miał smykałkę do robienia interesów. Axel zaczął interesować się kryptowalutami w latach 2010-2011.
translation.portuguese: Axel é sueco, tem 22 anos e é do Distrito de Heating Planner em Estocolmo, Suécia. Se envolve em grandes e pequenos negócios desde os 10 anos de idade. Axel adentrou o cenário das criptomoedas pela primeira vez por volta de 2010-2011.
translation.swedish: Axel is a 22 year old District Heating Planner from Stockholm, Sweden. He's been doing business, big and small, since he was about 10 years old. Axel joined the crypto-scene the first time back in 2010-2011.

translation.english: David Mercer studied math and computer science at the University of Arizona. He's been involved with financial cryptography for 15 years and has a 20+ year career in IT. He did the first ports of Zcash to non-linux platforms. He has contributed to the zcash protocol design and codebase, and his pre-blockchain fintech experience includes consulting for NASDAQ, IslandECN, BofA and the 3 largest banks in Mexico.
translation.spanish: David Mercer estudió Matemáticas y Ciencias de la Computación, en la Universidad de Arizona. Ha estado involucrado en criptografía financiera por 15 años y tiene más de 20 años de carrera en informática. Él hizo las primeras versiones de Zcash para plataformas no-linux. Ha contribuido al diseño y código base del protocolo zcash; y su experiencia en tecnologías financieras "pre-blockchain" incluye consultorías para NASDAQ, IslandECN, BofA y los tres bancos más grandes de México.
translation.polish: David Mercer studiował matematykę oraz informatykę na uniwersytecie Arizony. Finansową kryptografią zajmuje się od ponad 15 lat, łącząc to z 20-letnim doświaczeniem w sektorze IT. Przeprowadził on pierwszy port Zcash'a na nie lunuxowe platformy. Współpracował przy tworzeniu designu protokołu oraz kodu zcash, dzięki swojej wiedzy z zakresu blockchain'ów był konsultantem dla NASDAQ, IslandECN, Bofa, oraz 3 największych banków w Meksyku.
translation.portuguese: David Mercer estudou matemática e ciência da computação na Universidade de Arizona. Ele esteve envolvido com criptografia financeira por 15 anos e tem uma carreira de mais de 20 anos na TI. Ele fez as primeiras portas do Zcash para plataformas não-linux. Ele contribuiu para o projeto de protocolo Zcash e a base de código, e sua experiência pre-blockchain fintech inclui consultoria para NASDAQ, Island ECN, BofA e os 3 maiores bancos do México.
translation.swedish: David Mercer studied math and computer science at the University of Arizona. He's been involved with financial cryptography for 15 years and has a 20+ year career in IT. He did the first ports of Zcash to non-linux platforms. He has contributed to the zcash protocol design and codebase, and his pre-blockchain fintech experience includes consulting for NASDAQ, IslandECN, BofA and the 3 largest banks in Mexico.

translation.english: Iolar is a 29 year old, front-end web developer and cryptocurrency day trader from Brazil. He has more than 15 years of experience in the area of web development and has worked in several agencies and companies including A Estrutural, Agrobovi, A Foco and Dual Studio.
translation.spanish: Iolar tiene 29 años de edad, es desarrollador web front-end y comerciante diario de criptomonedas, de Brazil. Tiene más de quince años de experiencia en el área de desarollo web, y ha trabajado en varias agencias y compañías incluyendo Estrutural, Agrobovi, Foco, y Dual Studio.
translation.polish: Iolar jest 29-letnim frond-end web deweloperem oraz traderem kryptowalut pochodzącym z Brazylii. Posiada ponad 15 lat doświadczenia w web developingu i pracował w wielu cenionych firmach takich jak: A Estrutural, Agrobovi, A Foco oraz Dual Studio.
translation.portuguese: Iolar é brasileiro, tem 29 anos, e é desenvolvedor web front-end e cryptocurrency day trader. Possui mais de 15 anos de experiência na área de desenvolvimento web atuando em diversas agências e empresas, incluindo A Estrutural, Agrobovi, A Foco e Dual Studio.
translation.swedish: Iolar is a 29 year old, front-end wed developer and cryptocurrency day trader from Brazil. He has more than 15 years of experience in the area of web development and has worked in several agencies and companies including A Estrutural, Agrobovi, A Foco and Dual Studio.

translation.english: Matthew is a freelance full-stack web developer and cryptocurrency enthusiast from Illinois. His passions are security and authentication, and gaming (#PCMasterRace). By day he is a Cyber Threat Analyst.
translation.spanish: Matthew es un desarrollador freelance web full-stack y entusiasta de las criptomonedas, de Illinois. Sus pasiones son la seguridad, autenticación, y juegos (#PCMasterRace). De día es Analista de Cyber-Amenazas.
translation.polish: Matthew jest freenalcerem web deweloperem oraz entuzjastą kryptowalut z Illinois. Jego pasjami są: bezpieczeństwo i autoryzacja danych, gaming (#PCMasterRace). Zawodowo jest Analitykiem Cyber Zagrożeń.
translation.portuguese: Matthew é um desenvolvedor web full-stack freelancer e entusiasta de cryptomoedas de Illinois. Suas paixões são segurança, autenticação e jogos (#PCMasterRace). De dia ele é um Analista de Ameaças Cibernéticas.
translation.swedish: Matthew is a freelance full-stack web developer and cryptocurrency enthusiast from Illinois. His passions are security and authentication, and gaming (#PCMasterRace). By day he is a Cyber Threat Analyst.

translation.english: Contributions from the community help keep Hush alive. To contribute join us in our Slack, and review our Github repositories.
translation.spanish: Las constribuciones de la comunidad ayudan a mantener Hush vivo. Para contribuir, ingresa a nuestro Slack, y revisa nuestros repositorios Github.
translation.polish: Wsparcie ze strony społeczności jest kluczowe dla rozwoju Hush. By wspomóc, dołącz do nas na Slack, lub oceń nasz projekt na Github.
translation.portuguese: As contribuições da comunidade ajudam a manter Hush viva. Para contribuir, junte-se a nós em nosso Slack, e revise nossos repositórios no Github.
translation.swedish: Contributions from the community help keep Hush alive. To contribute join us in our Slack, and review our Github repositories.

translation.english: Donations keep the lights and servers on.
translation.spanish: Las donaciones mantienen las luces y los servidores prendidos.
translation.portuguese: As doações mantêm as luzes e os servidores ligados.
translation.swedish: Donations keep the lights and servers on.

translation.english: Because with a premine we have a financial rock to lay back on, we will be able to offer contributors bounties for their contributions.
translation.spanish: Porque con una pre-minería tenemos un respaldo financiero en el cual apoyarnos, que nos posibilitará ofrecer "botines" a quienes contribuyan, por sus contribuciones.
translation.polish: Są one naszym finansowym fundamentem, pozwalającym na rozwój projektu oraz nagradzanie naszych współpracowników.
translation.portuguese: Porque com uma "pré-mineração" obtemos recursos financeiros, para oferecer recompensas por suas contribuições.
translation.swedish: Because with a premine we have a financial rock to lay back on, we will be able to offer contributors bounties for their contributions.

translation.english: Will be able to track the premine?
translation.polish: Czy mogę znaleść stan konta premine?
translation.swedish: Will be able to track the premine?

translation.english: Yes, the address with the premined coins will be public.
translation.spanish: Sí, la dirección donde están las monedas pre-minadas será pública.
translation.portuguese: Sim, o endereço com a "pré-mineração" e seus dados, será público.
translation.swedish: Yes, the address with the premined coins will be public.

translation.english: How is the development progressing, how can I find out?
translation.spanish: ¿Cuál es el progreso del desarrollo, y cómo puedo saberlo?
translation.polish: W jakim tempie postępuje dewloping, gdzie mogę to sprawdzić?
translation.portuguese: Como o desenvolvimento está progredindo, como posso apurar?
translation.swedish: How is the development progressing, how can I find out?

translation.spanish: O sino, puedes enviarnos un mensaje privado!
translation.polish: Lub napisz do nas prywatną wiadomość!

translation.english: If you want to contribute, contact one of us and we'll discuss your idea(s) and how you can contribute.
translation.spanish: Si quieres contribuir, contacta a uno de nosotros y discutiremos tu(s) idea(s) y cómo puedes contribuir.
translation.polish: Jeśli chcesz nas wspomóc, skontaktuj się z nami, a omówimy Twój pomysł i podejmiemy decyzję.
translation.portuguese: Se você quiser contribuir, entre em contato com um de nós, discutiremos suas ideias e como você pode contribuir.
translation.swedish: If you want to contribute, contact one of us an we'll discuss your idea(s) and how you can contribute.

translation.english: How do we contact you and can we ask about anything?
translation.polish: Jak możemy się skontaktować i o co możemy pytać?
translation.portuguese: Como entramos em contato e podemos perguntar sobre qualquer coisa?
translation.swedish: How do we contact you and can we ask about anything?

translation.english: , yes you can ask about anything Hush related!
translation.spanish: , sí, puedes preguntar cualquier cosa relacionada a Hush!
translation.polish: , możesz pytać o wszystko, co jest związane z Hush!
translation.portuguese: , sim, pode perguntar qualquer coisa relacionada à Hush!
translation.swedish: , yes you can ask about anything Hush related!

translation.english: Leave us a message by filling out the form below if you would like more information about the project, or have any questions about us.
translation.spanish: Déjanos un mensaje llenando el siguiente formulario, en caso de que quieras recibir más información sobre el proyecto, o si tienes alguna pregunta sobre nosotros.
translation.polish: Zostaw nam wiadomość, wypełniając poniższy formularz
translation.portuguese: Deixe-nos uma mensagem preenchendo o formulário abaixo, se desejar mais informações sobre o projeto ou tiver dúvidas sobre nós.
translation.swedish: Leave us a message by filling out the form below if you would like more information about the project, or have any questions about us.

translation.english: (We will respond as soon as possible.)
translation.swedish: (We will respond as soon as possible.)
